attendanceConfiguration.clockInSettingsDescription: Configure the days on which users are eligible to log their time.
attendanceConfiguration.isClockInOnNonWorkingDays: Clock in on non working days
attendanceConfiguration.timesheetSettingsDescription: Specify whether time entry changes should be auto-approved.
attendanceConfiguration.title: Attendance Configurations
attendanceConfiguration.updateErrorMessage: Failed to update the attendance configuration. Please try again.
attendanceConfiguration.updateSuccessMessage: Attendance Configuration has been updated successfully

clockInTableSummary.noDataDescription: Data will be available once your team members start recording time
clockInTableSummary.title: Clock-in Summary

timeWidget.autoClockedOutMessage: You have been clocked out. If you are still working, please clock in again
timeWidget.clockInConfirmationDescription: You have applied for a leave today. Are you sure you want to clock in?
timeWidget.clockOutAlertMessage: You will be clocked out in 10 minutes. If you wish to continue working, please clock in again.
timeWidget.clockOutConfirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to clock out?
timeWidget.notAllowedToClockInOnHolidaysTooltip: You are not allowed to clock in on company holidays
timeWidget.notAllowedToClockInOnLeaveDaysTooltip: You are not allowed to clock in on leave days
timeWidget.notAllowedToClockInOnNonWorkingDaysToolt: You are not allowed to clock in on non-working days

timesheet.addTimeEntryErrorDes: Failed to submit the time log. Please try again
timesheet.addTimeEntrySuccessDes: Your time log has has been submitted for approval successfully
timesheet.approveFailDes: Failed to approve {{name}}'s time entry request. Please try again.
timesheet.approveSuccessDes: {{name}}'s time entry request has been approved successfully.
timesheet.confirmationModalDes: You have applied for a leave on selected date. Are you sure you want to add the time entry?
timesheet.declineFailDes: Failed to decline {{name}}'s time entry request. Please try again.
timesheet.declineSuccessDes: {{name}}'s time entry request has been declined successfully.
timesheet.editTimeEntrySuccessDes: Your changes for time log has been successfully submitted for approval.
timesheet.emptyRequestDesEmployee: You have no time requests recorded for this period
timesheet.emptyRequestDesManager: When you get a time entry request from an employee under your supervision, it will be promptly displayed here
timesheet.entryExistModalDes: A time log for the selected date already exists. Creating a new entry will affect the existing time log. Are you sure you want to proceed?
timesheet.holidayConfirmationModalDes: The selected date has been declared as a company holiday. Are you sure you want to add the time entry?

individualTimeSheetAnalytics.noDataDescription: The data is not sufficient to display the worked hours trend yet. Keep your fingers crossed, the information will be right back up!
individualTimeSheetAnalytics.title: Timesheet

timesheet.invalidClockInDes: Please enter a clock-in time that precedes the original clock-out time
timesheet.invalidClockOutDes: Please enter a clock-out time that is later than the original clock-in time
timesheet.invalidEntryDes: Clock in time cannot be the same as clock out time
timesheet.invalidTimeDes: Clock in time cannot be later than the clock out time.

kebabMenu.label: View more actions for {{recordName}} time entry request

timesheet.noTimeEntryDes: There are no recorded time entries during this period. Once a time entry is recorded, it will be promptly displayed here
timesheet.ongoingEntryModalDes: There is an ongoing time entry. Time entries can be edited once you have clocked out. Please wait for the current entry to end before making any edits.
timesheet.requestExistModalDes: You have already submitted a time entry request for this period and it's currently awaiting approval. Please wait for processing or consider canceling the existing request and submitting a new one.
timesheet.search: Search by employee name, or team name
timesheet.serachBarPlaceholder: Search by employee name, or team name
